ModMetaData.name: Simple Skulls
ModMetaData.author: GeodesicDragon
ModMetaData.description:
Are you like me and keep forgetting to remove skulls from corpses before cremating or butchering them? Then this mod is for you!
Adds two recipes to the crematorium, both of which provide a skull when a humanoid corpse is destroyed; one will auto strip the corpse while the other won't. Also adds recipes to the butcher's table and the butcher's spot.
Handy for building all of the skullspikes you'll need to keep those pesky slaves in line.
Thanks to Jiopaba from the RimWorld Discord for the name of the mod.
